First strike
[i]Toss a Coin[/i] – When Randal, Evil Knight, enters, create X treasure tokens, where X is the amount of mana produced by treasures to cast him.
[i]Worthwhile Wager[/i] – Sacrifice three Treasures: Each player clash. The winning player creates three Treasure tokens. If you won, draw three cards instead. [i](Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)[/i]
